hopobject.name: simulink
hopobject.body: MATLAB and Simulink can be used to develop standalone, real-time algorithms for the BeagleBoard, a low-cost, single-board computer designed for audio, video, and digital signal processing. The standard BeagleBoard includes a TI OMAP3530 processor that has an ARM Cortex core running Linux; a C64x+ DSP core; stereo audio and digital video connectivity; and USB, RS232, and Ethernet support.
hopobject.shortdesc: This offering from the Mathworks enables users of MATLAB and Simulink to target the BeagleBoard.
